content:
/>
VIII.iii.4.B.4.g
.
Handling Dose Estimates of Not Exposed or Zero
If the dose estimate received from DTRA is not exposed or zero, then do
not
submit the case to Compensation Service.
Refer these claims to the rating activity for a decision on the issue of SC for residuals of radiation exposure.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Disabilities Resulting from Ionizing Radiation Exposure Under 38 CFR 3.311
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
